meanings.definition: The act of converting a process or system into one that utilizes conveyors.
meanings.sent1: The conveyorizations in the factory made production faster.
meanings.sent2: The conveyorizations at the airport efficiently moved luggage from one place to another.
meanings.sent3: The conveyorizations in the grocery store made shopping feel like a conveyor belt race.
meanings.sent4: The conveyorizations of information flow in the office resembled a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The conveyorizations of the assembly line were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state of being organized or structured using conveyors.
meanings.sent1: The conveyorizations of the warehouse improved efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The conveyorizations of the library ensured books were easily accessible.
meanings.sent3: The conveyorizations of the traffic system kept cars moving smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The conveyorizations of the event setup made everything fall into place seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The conveyorizations of the supply chain simplified the entire process.
